quest_name: Necromancer Epic 1.0 - Scythe of the Shadowed Soul

steps.description: Speak to Kazen Fecae in Lake Rathetear to begin the quest. Give him a Shadowed Scythe to start.
Kill an Iksar Broodling in Warsliks Woods and loot the Greenmist Jade.
Kill a Shadowed Man in various zones and loot the Sands of the Mystics.
Kill a forsaken revenant in Plane of Hate and loot the Essence of a Vampire.
Kill a Ghost of Kindle in The Hole and loot the Essence of a Ghost.
Kill The Tangrin in Field of Bone and loot the Sands of the Mystics.
Combine Greenmist Jade, Sands of the Mystics, Essence of a Vampire, and Essence of a Ghost in Necromancer's Sack to create Sack for Kazen.
Give Sack for Kazen to Kazen Fecae in Lake Rathetear to receive the 1st Piece of the Scythe.
Kill Drusella Sathir in Howling Stones and loot the Darkened Book.
Give the Darkened Book to Kazen Fecae in Lake Rathetear to receive the 2nd Piece of the Scythe.
Kill a forsaken revenant in Plane of Hate and loot the Essence of a Vampire.
Kill a Ghost of Kindle in The Hole and loot the Essence of a Ghost.
Kill The Tangrin in Field of Bone and loot the Sands of the Mystics.
Combine Greenmist Jade, Sands of the Mystics, Essence of a Vampire, and Essence of a Ghost in Necromancer's Sack to create Sack for Kazen.
Give Sack for Kazen to Kazen Fecae in Lake Rathetear to receive the 1st Piece of the Scythe.
Kill Drusella Sathir in Howling Stones and loot the Darkened Book.
Give the Darkened Book to Kazen Fecae in Lake Rathetear to receive the 2nd Piece of the Scythe.
Kill Lhranc in City of Mist and loot the Final Piece of the Scythe.
Give the Final Piece of the Scythe to Kazen Fecae in Lake Rathetear to receive the Scythe of the Shadowed Soul.
